name: (Christian)
bio: Likes to bongo on his belly ðŸ‘¶

Weapon1.PrimaryD: Plucks a chin hair and flicks it forward in a short-range burst. Functions like a tight shotgun spread: high damage up close, heavy falloff at distance.
Weapon1.SecondaryD: A carefully pulled, tension-charged hair that fires as a single, precise projectile with improved accuracy and moderate damage.

Ability1D: You eat an entire cup of yogurt. Within moments, your stomach bloats outward and forms a forward barrier. Absorbs a large amount of frontal damage but limits mobility slightly.
Ability2D: Throws up to three gas bombs that burst into clouds ofâ€¦ unfortunate fumes. Enemies inside the area are slowed and take damage over time.
PassiveD: Taking damage slowly increases your internal pressure. When the meter is full, your next melee hit deals bonus knockback.
UltimateD: For 10 seconds, you gain greatly increased movement speed when not firing. You can lunge forward to close distance and repeatedly bongo-slap your stomach, creating a shockwave that stuns and knocks back enemies in a small radius. Each slam also provides a light heal to nearby allies. Moderate cooldown between slams prevents spamming.
